title: (x) Bauhaus-like typeface - various {gang}
content:
need a font like the one I have drawn in the attachment. It is think, symetric, and has rounded angles. Notice the 'w' is round on the bottoms instead of having sharp angles. I also gave two examples of how the 'b' should look. Note; these are hand drawings, I am not looking for a font that emulates handwriting. Please help and thanks for your time.   
 ![Hand drawn font](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125104503im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69016.jpg)
author: ohal3000

comments.content:
Could be ' [Bayer Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125104503/http:/www.type.nu/fonts/bayersans.html)', by Noah Rothschild..   
_( Or a blend of ' [Chalet '70](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125104503/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts)', 'w' + 'b'; and ' [Chalet '60 / '80](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125104503/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts)', 'e'..   
Or even a slightly customized ' [Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125104503/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=Bauhaus)', as well.. )_

Others with a similar look:   
   
 [Blippo](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125104503/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/blippo/black-ef/testdrive.html?s=webb&p=48)   
 [Bayer Universal](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125104503/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/bayer-universal/p22-bayer-universal/testdrive.html?s=webb&p=48)   
 [Pump](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125104503/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/pump/regular/testdrive.html?s=webb&p=48)   
 [Cleancut](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125104503/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/cleancut/cleancut/testdrive.html?s=webb&p=48)   
   
You can also look in [Mike Yanega's Bauhaus Guide Part 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125104503/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces1.html) for others.   
 - Lex
